Recipe.Description:
Butter 'sauce'.
You can use it to finish sauces รก la minute, you baste meats with it, you can mix flavors into it and use it as is, you can poach lobster in it -for all the things on which you'd use whole butter, you can use this. It's embarrassingly easy to make.

Ingredient.Name: Butter
Ingredient.Notes: Or more. Seriously. As much as you wish.

Method.Step: Whisk butter into the water, a tablespoon at a time.
